data.title: Total Snowfall for Switzerland in December
data.meta_description: Snowfall averages for April at cities, resorts and mountains in Switzerland, including total snowfall and days with new snow.
data.text:
The tables below give monthly averages for snowfall during December at cities, resorts and mountains in Switzerland. Each place has a total for how many days of fresh snow it usually gets this month and for the normal amount of snowfall.

The calculation of days only includes the days when new snow totalled at least one centimetre (0.4 inches).

The month's total snowfall is an average of weather data collected during 1981 to 2010.
